ca.uqac.lif.textidote

Class Linter

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.uqac.lif.textidote.Linter

  • public class Linter
extends java.lang.Object
    Object in charge of evaluating a set of rules on a piece of text.
    Author:
    Sylvain Hall√©
